title: What’s on Google TV: Netflix loses subscribers following price hikes, blames password sharing
content:
This was an awful week to be Netflix, as the company announced its first ever quarter with a subscriber loss, and more to come following continues price hikes. In an effort to reverse that, Netflix also has plans to adopt an ad-supported plan, and crack down on password sharing. Read on for more about Netflix and the rest of what’s on Google TV.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Netflix loses subscribers following price hikes, blames password sharing appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: During the first quarter of 2022, Netflix announced that it lost over 200,000 subscribers, the first loss in nearly a decade.
